abstract: Los Angeles police question hip-hop music executive Suge Knight about suspected involvement in hit-and-run that left one pedestrian dead and another hospitalized; Knight had turned himself in following incident.
lead_paragraph: The police in the Los Angeles area had been searching Thursday for the hip-hop executive Marion Knight, known as Suge, who was believed to have been involved in a fatal hit-and-run.
snippet: The police in the Los Angeles area had been searching Thursday for the hip-hop executive Marion Knight, known as Suge, who was believed to have been involved in a fatal hit-and-run.

headline.main: Suge Knight, Music Executive, Is Questioned by Police in Hit-and-Run
headline.print_headline: Police Seek Music Executive After a Fatal Hit-and-Run
